-1.title: ON the TRAIL of a HITMAN

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

1.title: In Harm's Way

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Family and friends are frantic when Jeanine Harms goes out on a date and disappears into thin air. Puzzled by a lack of evidence, police desperately try to solve the case. As time passes, no one is ready for the final outcome.

2.title: Web of Lies

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Employees at a West Virginia security company receive a bewildering SOS call from their boss and are shocked to learn he's been shot and left to die in the mountains. His missing body causes police to question the web of lies that surround his death.

3.title: Relative Suspects

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Barbara Lloyd, mother of two young children, is murdered in 1974 in a working class district of Buffalo New York. Her husband Galen 'Shorty' Lloyd will be a murder suspect, along with her brother in law Leon Rusty Chatt and her landlord. It will take Barbara's grown daughter Kim Lloyd to create the impetus to solve the murder almost 30 years later. A\In 2003, at the age of 33, Kim contacts the Buffalo Police to demand a report on the status of her mother's case given the latest developments in DNA identification.

4.title: The Body in the Bay

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Storyline On a beautiful Monday afternoon in August 1993, a boater in Chesapeake Bay finds a woman's body floating. The woman is Nancy Lynn Manni, 33 years old, an employee of the Seafarers Union. This murder will not be solved until the winter of 1997.

5.title: Queen of Hearts

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Bill Hassler returns home to find his high school sweetheart, Susan Schwarz, naked and shot three times under a towel. Detectives first suspect a crime of passion. Investigators are under heavy pressure to nab a suspect, but Susan's case goes cold.

6.title: Not Again

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: When Carla Larson leaves work to grab lunch, she never returns. The all-American wife and mother is discovered naked and strangled to death in a nearby swamp. The investigation stalls...until a random love triangle provides a clue to finding her killer.

7.title: Dying to Fit In

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: Sharon Bloom leaves work for lunch and vanishes. Ten days later, her body is found brutally murdered in a cornfield, her skull fractured. As years pass and pressure mounts on police, will they ever discover evidence to convict Shannon's killer?

8.title: He Came for Me

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Nanine Grimes is home alone, listening to music, and doing schoolwork. Within hours, she is found murdered on her sister's punctured waterbed. She's been stabbed 86 times. As police struggle to discover a lead, they wonder...did Nanine know her killer?

9.title: Wicked in the Windy City

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Renee heads home from the gym on a cold, rainy Halloween; her favorite night of the year. The next day, she's found strangled to death on her bathroom floor. Police struggle to identify a killer. Could Renee be a victim of a 'trick or treat' gone bad?

10.title: Crossed Dressed to Kill

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: Kacy Kay Ray leaves her parents' home after celebrating Christmas and vanishes. Days later, her frozen body is found in a field bludgeoned and stabbed, the victim of a gruesome rape. Will police pin the crime on the correct murderer?

16.title: A Killer Family

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

16.plot:

2.title: Ring of Deceit

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: When a woman disappears on her way to the Seattle airport, her fiancÃ© makes an emotional appeal for her safe return. Two weeks later, her body is found in the trunk of her car missing her engagement ring and her shoelaces oddly tied.

3.title: Highway Killer

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot:
Know what this is about?

4.title: A Haitian Homicide

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot:

5.title: Murder at the Farmhouse

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: The town folk of Enderby are shocked when the bodies of a hard-working dairy farmer and his wife are discovered in the living room of their country home. RCMP Detectives launch a clever undercover sting to catch the killer.

6.title: Kansas Killer

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Family and friends of Edna Walton, a loving mother and grandmother, are shocked when she is found murdered in her home. Years later, the victim's grandson convinces Investigators to take another look at this cold case.

8.title: Not Forgotten

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: A young surfer's charred remains are discovered in a Huntington Beach apartment fire. Two small droplets of blood, collected in his kitchen, help police catch the murderer -15 years later!

9.title: Bad for Business

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Kathleen Smith is bludgeoned to death and her Tempe, Arizona home is then set on fire. Investigators have two suspects but no hard evdence to tie either to the murder. And it will take 15 years before a jailhouse tip finally leads cops to the killer.

11.title: Death Knocks

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: An Austin woman makes the deadly decision to show her high-end home to a killer posing as a prospective buyer. With a murderer on the loose in this normally tranquil neighborhood, the pressure is on for detectives to stop him before he strikes again.

14.title: The Face of Justice

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

14.plot: Kids playing on the shore of the Wisconsin River make a grisly find - body parts in garbage bags. In an effort to solve this horrific murder, detectives employ a forensic anthropologist and cutting edge technology.

17.title: Northern Nightmare

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

17.plot: An Anchorage nurse disappears from her house and only her abandoned car is found. Local police enlist the help of the FBI to solve this baffling case and their specialized scent dogs lead investigators straight to the killer's doorstep.

20.title: Into Thin Air

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

20.plot: A glamorous flight attendant disappears and the story makes headlines. An intense search reveals few clues. But a graveside discovery eventually forces police to take a second look at some already familiar faces.

1.title: Murder at the Met

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: A beautiful young violinist is murdered at the venerable Metropolitan Opera House in Manhattan and the story becomes an international scandal. Police interview everyone behind the scenes and the search is on for the real Â'Phantom of the Opera.'

2.title: One Stormy Night

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: With a thriving business and a baby on the way, a Florida couple is strangled to death in their home. Suspicions about drug smuggling and an aviation deal gone wrong lead detectives to Belize, but are they looking in the right direction?

3.title: Nightmares in Babysitting

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Fourteen-year-old Karen Slattery is brutally stabbed and raped while babysitting in South Florida's upscale Delray Beach. Police follow up on dozens of tips but the case goes cold. That is until a nearly identical crime strikes terror in nearby Boca Rato.

4.title: Before He Kills Again

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: A woman's body is dumped alongside a road near Tampa, Florida. And within a year, the bodies of two more women are found at the side of the road. Detectives fear a serial predator is on the loose, but the search for the killer will take years.

5.title: An Orphans Ordeal

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: In Boston, 18-year-old Amy Roman is found slaughtered in her South End apartment. Police believe the victim knew her assailant. But when the case goes cold, her determined family undertakes an investigation of their own.

6.title: A Secret Life

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: A pillar of the Haitian community in Spring Valley, New York, is gunned down in his driveway, and the suspects include the victim's terminally ill wealthy second wife, his alleged mistress, and her gun-toting ex-husband.

7.title: No Reason to Die

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: When John and Nancy Bosco are shot at close range in their Bigfork, Montana home, the search is on for a cold-blooded killer. But with few clues and no suspects the case stalls. And John's mother eventually turns to an unorthodox source for help.

8.title: Bad Things Happen to Good People

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Bob Henry is gunned down in broad daylight outside the Tacoma, Washington warehouse where he works. The execution-style murder looks like a professional hit. But to solve the crime, police need to find the murder weapon.

9.title: Frontier Justice

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot:
Know what this is about?

10.title: Wendy Stark

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Secret Thoughts

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Identifying Remains

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: When a work crew uncovers a woman's skull on a stretch of Florida highway, investigators try to determine who she is and find her killer. But it will take a bizarre discovery over a thousand miles away before the grizzly truth is finally revealed.

2.title: What Happened in Vegas?

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Single mom Donna Kitowski decides to bake cookies late at night and heads to her local Las Vegas supermarket. But she never comes home. And before long, the local TV news is reporting that a woman's near-lifeless body has been found in the desert.

3.title: If Dogs Could Talk

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: When Cathy Lamb is brutally murdered in her Palm Beach, Florida home, the only witnesses are her three blood-soaked dogs. The gruesome scene baffles detectives. And with no suspects and no murder weapon, they have only their suspicions to go on.

4.title: Who Took Polly Klaas?

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Twelve-year-old Polly Klaas and two friends are having a sleepover and playing board games, when a man brandishing a knife appears at the door, ties them up, nabs Polly, and then disappears into the night.

5.title: Where Murders Go Unsolved

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: In an Indiana college town, a 19-year-old journalism student is raped and murdered in her own bed. The case becomes the latest of several unsolved homicides in the area. And it will take years - and yet another murder - before the sinister truth emerges.

6.title: Highway to Hell

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Investigators believe a serial robber, rapist, and murderer is terrorizing cities up and down the west coast. And as the death toll rises, police jurisdictions in three states join the hunt for the 'I-5 Killer.'

7.title: Have You Seen Our Sister?

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: A hard-working single mom is murdered in a Michigan town where violent crime rates are nearly four times the national average. And while a TV celebrity leads a major media campaign, the search is on for a mysterious man known only as 'B'.

8.title: Texas Massacre

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: The residents of Kilgore, Texas are reeling from the execution-style slaying of five people abducted from a fast-food restaurant. But it will take several decades and major advances in DNA technology before the perpetrators can be brought to justice.

9.title: The Ballad of Melissa Love

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Country singer Melissa Haferman has just recorded her first CD in Nashville when her lifeless body is found in a vacant lot near the Louisville, Kentucky bus depot. And it will take four years and a macabre discovery before police close in on her killer.

10.title: A Chance Encounter

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: A 20-year-old woman is gunned down in a Maryland suburb and the random crime is a mystery from the start. With few leads and virtually no evidence, the case goes cold. And it will take 25 years before investigators finally close in on the killer.

11.title: Who Do You Trust?

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: The severely mutilated body of 17-year-old Shauna Card is discovered in her Orlando, Florida home. And though it takes years to crack the case, detectives eventually unravel a grizzly tale and find a killer closer to home than anyone expected.

12.title: When the Smoke Clears

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: Authorities in Washington are stunned when a mother of three dies from cyanide poisoning. And the resulting murder investigation eventually reveals a pattern of tampered boxes and blister packs, more deaths, and a reptilian story of greed and betrayal.

13.title: Three Times the Pain

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: A popular college student is brutally stabbed to death during her first-ever night shift at a convenience store in Great Falls, Montana. And it will take a decade before an informant comes forward with a story that leads the cops to her killer.

1.title: Who Killed Daddy's Little Girl?

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: When a pregnant 23-year-old Iowa woman is shot in her own bed, investigators must quickly determine if they are looking for someone with a deadly grudge against the couple or a more sinister culprit closer to home.

2.title: Mommy Speak for Me

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: In Cleveland, a 14-year-old African-American girl is snatched off the street, assaulted and murdered on her way to school. Initially, detectives work the case 24/7. But it will take a lucky break and nearly 30 years before the culprit is behind bars.

3.title: California Girl Gone

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: On her last day as a high school freshman, a 14-year-old girl is brutally beaten and set on fire. The horrifying crime sends shockwaves through her California community and with a possible serial killer on the loose, investigators hunt for a monster.

4.title: Dancing with the Devil

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Popular schoolteacher Marilyn Habian is shot in the heart in the basement of her Cleveland-area home. And years after the case goes cold, news of a potential prison confession leads investigators back to her front door.

5.title: An Angel Taken

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: A devout Mormon and popular University student, 19-year-old Brooke Wilberger is abducted from an Oregon parking lot in broad daylight. Police immediately launch a massive search and the story of the missing 19-year-old soon captures headlines nationwide.

6.title: This Can't Be Happening

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: A woman's body is dumped in an Orlando park. And as detectives connect the dots, a spate of seemingly random beatings, carjackings, and murders soon tells the story of a one-man crime spree.

9.title: A Never Ending Nightmare

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: It's a September morning in 1973, and Debra Dill's bludgeoned body is discovered next to her car in rural Maine. Her grieving community wakes up to a nightmare, but it will take nearly two decades before the killer is behind bars.

10.title: Where Her Future Ends

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: When the naked blood-soaked body of a young woman is found on the floor of her Orlando apartment, it's up to investigators to find her killer before he strikes again.

1.title: More Than a Sister

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: When 18-year-old Lisa Monza is murdered in San Lorenzo, California, investigators look for a connection to other unsolved murders in the area. But it will take several years and help from an unlikely source before they can track down her killer.

2.title: Monster at the Door

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: A widow is murdered in her Salt Lake City home. Despite suspicion that the victim was murdered by someone she knew, the case goes cold for two decades, until a set of children's fingerprints leads to the killer.

3.title: Why Isn't She Smiling?

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: A high school senior is murdered in her family's Minnesota farmhouse, but with little evidence the case soon goes cold. Years later, a new set of eyes spots an overlooked clue, but cold case detectives will need more to convict the killer.

4.title: A Deadly Obsession

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: In a sleepy New Hampshire town, a man answers a knock at the door and is shot dead through the screen. Investigators are stumped. That is, until they uncover a seething grudge and a culprit closer to home than anyone could have imagined.

5.title: Gambling with Death

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Deep in Southern Louisiana, the bodies start piling up in a series of deadly home invasions. There's a curious link between the victims and a similar MO, and before long a combined task force is on the hunt for a serial killer.

6.title: A Sister's Promise

episode of.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: When the mutilated body of 17-year-old Lori Billingsley is found in a ditch on the outskirts of town, it's obvious a sadistic killer is on the loose in Oregon. But when the case goes cold, it's her sister who's determined to get justice for Lori.

imdb.plot outline: Baffling crimes and the clues that lead to the killer. Chilling reenactments of the victim's last days and the toll the deaths took on family and friends along with interviews and commentary from the real life detectives that tracked down the killer and crack the case.
imdb.title: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case
akas: Motives & Murders: Cracking the Case (United States)
plot: Baffling crimes and the clues that lead to the killer. Chilling reenactments of the victim's last days and the toll the deaths took on family and friends along with interviews and commentary from the real life detectives that tracked down the killer and crack the case.::Gpailkids
